question: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life, and can you generate an image of a minimalist digital workspace?

steps.content: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life, and can you generate an image of a minimalist digital workspace?
Plan: 1) Search for tips on applying minimalism to a digital life. 2) Generate an image of a minimalist digital workspace. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for tips on how to apply minimalism to a digital life.
To apply minimalism to your digital life, declutter your digital files, use a minimalist desktop background, and limit the number of apps on your home screen.
Generating an image of a minimalist digital workspace.
Image of a minimalist digital workspace generated.
